keyMoments.title: Happo Navy's Treasure Revealed
keyMoments.description: In flashback, it's revealed that the Happo Navy's treasure, accumulated over several hundred years, is stored beneath the Jewel Ice Sheet and can only be accessed using Chinjao's drill head.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Happo Navy as an ancient and wealthy organization with a unique treasure storage method.

keyMoments.title: Impact of Chinjao's Defeat by Garp
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows the Happo Navy crew witnessing Chinjao's defeat by Garp and the flattening of his drill head, which led to the crew losing access to their treasure.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a turning point for the Happo Navy, as they lost access to their accumulated wealth and their leader's legendary power.

crewGoals: Maintain the Happo Navy's martial arts tradition
Reclaim access to their treasure vault

crewAbilities.description: The secret martial art of the Happo Navy that creates powerful vibrations capable of shattering armor and defenses.

historicalEvents.description: Thirty years ago, Don Chinjao was defeated by Garp, leading to the loss of his drill head and the crew's inability to access their treasure.
historicalEvents.significance: Major setback for the crew that led to loss of wealth and prestige.

trivia: The Happo Navy is based in Kano Country in the West Blue
Their accumulated treasure spans several hundred years of the Chinjao family's history
The crew practices Hasshoken, a unique martial art passed down through generations
